attributes.action: give humanitarian aid to Cuba in the wake of hurricane Ike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am petitioning the government to provide humanitarian aid to the country of Cuba in its hour of need. 900,000 people were evacuated as the monstrous hurricane approached Cuba's mainland. The hurricane has left a trail of destruction in its wake with people losing their homes and 4 people losing their lives. This has been disastrous for Cuba so soon after hurricane Gustav.

The hurricane has devastated so many people in Cuba and for some the damage is irrepairable

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/gustav-cuba-aid/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
